title: Looking for casual OCE players to party up with
body:
Hey everyone, 

Im relatively new back to the game, just looking for some people to play some normal games with on my path to level 30!
Getting boring playing solo queue, so would be great to have some people to talk with and play with :)

My tag is SRAZERN so send me an add and lets get playing!

replies.body: If you enjoy ARAM then give us an add! (also a quick way to lvl)
